label: Description
value: Flowers with six petals, some of which are overlapping, others are simplying in whole form to create the overall design. The flowers are created through tiny puntuated holes (komon). There appears to be some dark marks thoughout the stencil that may suggest it was used at some point for textile design.

label: Description
value: Small towel or cover in undyed plain weave linen with a narrow tapestry weave band in blue and ivory at each end, and a floral band in blue, yellow and ivory at center. Eccentric wefts, slits. Warp fringes at both ends. One quarter at corner is missing.

value: Medium: linen, silk Technique: tapestry weave, plain weave

label: Description
value: Tiraz fragment of natural-colored linen with a two-centimeter wide band of multicolored silk tapestry medallions with bird-like forms. Fragment of selvedge on one side. Possibly from the Fatamid period.

value: Medium: linen, silk Technique: plain weave, slit tapestry

label: Description
value: One end of a loosely woven plain weave wool fabric with tapestry woven bands at one one. One band derived from Arabic script in black and ivory. The wider band a repeat of units containing two birds and a polychrome geometric band. The wider band reserved in the dying of the fabric to produce a deep red. Warp fringe at bottom.

label: Description
value: Perugia-type towel with bands of blue patterning at each end of a white field. Pattern bands, same at both ends starting from the bottom, have birds separated by trees and confronted lions separated by guard borders of arrow heads.

value: Medium: linen, cotton Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary weft; bird's eye twill weave

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Charles R. Gracie & Sons, Inc.

label: Description
value: Central field enclosed within a four-part border. Field is a black ogee lattice with a multicolored vine enclosing lobed red medallions with multicolor symmetrical floral pattern. Main border has a curving vine with large blossoms, leaves and birds in an Indian style on a greenish-tan background. Inner guard stripe, multicolored floral vine on a grey-green background. Outer guard stripe, stemmed triangles on a brown background.
